siteBg.default: none 0 0 center center auto repeat no-repeat fixed {color_2}

mobileBg.default: none 0 0 center center auto repeat no-repeat fixed {color_2}

formGroup.description: form group that this component belongs to

min.description: minimum allowed value for a numeric type field

max.description: maximum allowed value for a numeric type field

pattern.description: specifies a regular expression against which the control's value will be validate

checked.description: The checked status of the input

indeterminate.description: Used for three state check box

allowPastDates.description: if true all past days are enabled, false otherwise

allowFutureDates.description: if true all future days are enabled, false otherwise

styleType.description: type of the style, defaults to system style

pageId.description: for custom styles - id of the page where the component is

compId.description: for custom styles - id of the component that has the custom style

componentClassName.description: class name of the component type this style applies to

siteBg.default: none 0 0 center center auto repeat no-repeat fixed {color_2}

showFaces.description: Show profile photos in the plugin

colorScheme.description: The color scheme of the plugin. Note that the background is always transparent to match your background color. This setting changes the foreground colors to work well on light or dark backgrounds.

showStream.description: Show the profile stream for the public profile

showBorder.description: Show a border around the plugin

showHeader.description: Show the 'Find us on Facebook' bar at top. Only shown when either stream or faces are present

validationErrorMessage.default: To subscribe please fill in all the required info

indeterminate.description: Used for three state check box

validationErrorMessage.default: Please fill in all required fields.

address.default: 500 Terry Francois Street, 6th Floor. San Francisco, CA 94158

elementType.description: Selects the element type to which a styler should be applied. An element type distinguishes between the different representations of a feature.

featureType.description: Selects the feature, or group of features, to which a styler should be applied.

color.description: Sets the color of the feature. Valid values: An RGB hex string, i.e. '#ff0000'.

gamma.description: Modifies the gamma by raising the lightness to the given power.Valid values: Floating point numbers, [0.01, 10], with 1.0 representing no change.

hue.description: Sets the hue of the feature to match the hue of the color supplied. Note that the saturation and lightness of the feature is conserved, which means that the feature will not match the color supplied exactly. Valid values: An RGB hex string, i.e. '#ff0000'.

invert_lightness.description: A value of true will invert the lightness of the feature while preserving the hue and saturation.

lightness.description: Shifts lightness of colors by a percentage of the original value if decreasing and a percentage of the remaining value if increasing. Valid values: [-100, 100].

saturation.description: Shifts the saturation of colors by a percentage of the original value if decreasing and a percentage of the remaining value if increasing. Valid values: [-100, 100].

visibility.description: Sets the visibility of the feature. Valid values: 'on', 'off' or 'simplified'.

weight.description: Sets the weight of the feature, in pixels. Valid values: Integers greater than or equal to zero.

items.description: The style rules to apply to the selectors. The rules are applied to the map's elements in the order they are listed in this array.

options.description: a list of SelectOption data items

widgetId.description: hidden tpaSection part of multi section app
